channel.title: How do i change the price on objects in a shop?
channel.description:
How do i change the price on obgects in a shop..? because when i trade a shop keeper he has like a party hat for like 1mil and i want it for more please help me?!!?!?!?!? :)
Thanks

item.title: How do i change the price on objects in a shop?
item.dc:creator: @xxx123xxx xxx123xxx
item.description:
@xxx123xxx wrote:

[quote=“kingofnone, post:3, topic:256906”]open item.cfg and say we are changing the price to glow dagger

so type in your cntrl f

item= 747

and you see this

item = 747	Glowing_dagger	A_black_obsidian_dagger,_it_has_a_strange_aura_about_it_-_it_seems_to_be_glowing.	2147000000	2147000000	2147000000	999999	99999	99999	99999	9999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	99999	999999

were it says 2147000000, is the price of the object(price is always the 3 after the end of description… then comes the 5 attack bonuses and then 5 defense bonuses then str bonus and prayer bonus[/quote]
why did you remove the tabs?

Read full topic
item.source: How do i change the price on objects in a shop?

item.title: How do i change the price on objects in a shop?
item.dc:creator: @kingofnone kingofnone
item.description:
@kingofnone wrote:

open item.cfg and say we are changing the price to glow dagger

so type in your cntrl f

item= 747

and you see this

item = 747	Glowing_dagger	A_black_obsidian_dagger,_it_has_a_strange_aura_about_it_-_it_seems_to_be_glowing.	2147000000	2147000000	2147000000	999999	99999	99999	99999	9999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	999999	99999	999999

were it says 2147000000, is the price of the object(price is always the 3 after the end of description… then comes the 5 attack bonuses and then 5 defense bonuses then str bonus and prayer bonus
